1. City Council

City Council
============

The City Council meets on 4th Tuesday of each month at 6 p.m. in Council Chambers at 311 E. Main St

* [James Wansley](https://www.whitehousetx.org/179/Zack-Briscoe)
  , Mayor
* [Zack Briscoe](https://www.whitehousetx.org/175/Zack-Briscoe)
  , Place 1
* [Froncel Burns](https://www.whitehousetx.org/283/Froncel-Burns)
  , Place 2



* [John Chambers](https://www.whitehousetx.org/180/John-Chambers)
  , Place 3
* [Michael Lowe](https://www.whitehousetx.org/176/Michael-Lowe)
  , Place 4
* [Matt Lazarine](https://www.whitehousetx.org/276/Matt-Lazarine)
  , Place 5

About the City Council
----------------------

The City Council is the legislative and governing body for the City of Whitehouse. The Council consists of 5 council members and a mayor. The election of councilmembers is at large and by place while the mayor is elected solely at large. Each memberâ€™s term is 2 years.
